FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Minimize Taxation
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: Collect less taxes from your settlements. This will make them happier and reduce unrest. 65% basetax, +.5 happiness a day, -1 unrest a day.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Heavy Taxation
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: Increase the amount of taxes on your settlements. 125% basetax, -.5 happiness a day, +1 unrest per day, -50% unrest lost, -50% happiness gained.
